info.title: Info
info.subtitle: This will create an information page!
info.text: This contains general information about the museum.

hours.title: Hours
hours.subtitle: This will create an opening hours page!
hours.text: This contains information about the open and closing times.

admission.title: Admission
admission.subtitle: This will create an admission page!
admission.text: This contains admission fees for certain groups.

text.title: Text
text.subtitle: This will create a text page!
text.text: Here additional text can be entered.

object.title: Object
object.subtitle: This will create a museum object page!
object.text: This is to describe a generic museum exhibition object.

person.title: Person
person.subtitle: This will create a person page!
person.text: This is to describe a person.

event.title: Event
event.subtitle: This will create an event page!
event.text: This is to describe an event.

place.title: Place
place.subtitle: This will create a place page!
place.text: This is to describe a place.
